reasoning: Total cholangiocarcinoma (intrahepatic + extrahepatic) incidence ~2.0 per 100k globally circa 2005. Encompasses all bile duct malignancies. Significantly higher in Southeast Asia (Thailand ~85 per 100k) due to liver fluke infection.
source: Khan SA et al. (2005). Cholangiocarcinoma. Lancet. 366(9493):1303-1314
